attributes.action: cap police portion of council tax to the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lincolnshire police have just increased their portion of our council tax by 78.9% the reason given was to balance the books for a overspend last year,but are taking on hundreds of new staff,if allowed no police force will need to keep to budget but add any shortfall to their portion of the council tax so increasing our burden!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
